H0.text: Michael J Fox travels back to which year in the Wild West in the 1990 film ‘Back To The Future Part III’. 1850

H1.text: Michael J Fox travels back to which year in the Wild West in the 1990 film ‘Back To The Future Part III’. 1876

H2.text: Michael J Fox travels back to which year in the Wild West in the 1990 film ‘Back To The Future Part III’. 1865

H3.text: Michael J Fox travels back to which year in the Wild West in the 1990 film ‘Back To The Future Part III’. 1885

A4.text: Marty McFly learns that Doc was sent 70 years in the past to 1885.

A5.text: Marty travels to 1885 with the intent of rescuing Doc and then return to 1985, but matters are complicated when Doc falls in love with Clara Clayton.
